casebody.data:
Patrick A. Merrill
v.
Winston-Salem Forsyth County Board Of Education No. 449P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017. Mr. Norman B. Smith, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, For Merrill, Patrick A. Ms. Roberta King Latham, Mr. Joshua H. Bennett, Winston-Salem, Ms. Jasmine M. Pitt, Attorneys at Law, For Winston-Salem Forsyth County Board of Education

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of December 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
